41167.name: Africa Dataset: Percentage of primary schools with toilets (%)
41167.description: Share of public primary schools with a pit latrine, an improved pit latrine, a flush toilet, a pour-flush toilet or a composting toilet. Data available for African countries only. For more information, consult the UNESCO Institute for Statistics' Regional Data Collections page.
41167.s_name: World Bank EdStats: Africa Dataset: Percentage of primary schools with toilets (%)

source.name: World Bank EdStats: Africa Dataset: Percentage of primary schools with toilets (%)
